name: Kiospoly (itch)
description:
Buy land and build the best food kiosks until you form a big monopoly in the neighborhood. Become the best businessman, and bankrupt your friends through an evil capitalist strategy!
 You need to keep your money in the positive through property management, negotiations, and of course, luck!
 Kiospoly was based on classic board games from the 90s, themed with banking, simple economics, and fast food. It can be played online supporting 2 to 6 people
